description: CCTV captures undercover forces disguised as medics and nurses in the hospital with weapons raised.
maintext: The security camera video from Ibn Sina hospital shows several members of the Israeli undercover unit - men and women - hurrying through a corridor, training their weapons left and right. One can be seen taking a piece of clothing off an unidentified person who is kneeling down with his hands behind his head, then covering his head with it.
title: Israeli forces kill three Palestinian fighters in West Bank hospital raid
